0: This is clearly a carefully staffed and well managed property that values its guests not just customers
We did find the concierge very helpful are not they just about everywhereWil look to stay elsewhere if we return to Malta
I understand that the hotel was fully booked and were training new staff but I would not have booked at this hotel if I knew we were going to be next to a construction site
The service is very good but there is a need for more attention to details
Despite an enjoyable stay during which the staff were most helpful the 5 star rating for the hotel is perhaps stretching matters
A couple of small service issues but nothing major
The service would rate 45 mostly because there were too many young apprentices when I was there
so you do not even have to walk by the reception desk which is on 3 for some reason
Just a note for people coming to stay reception is on the 3rd floor of hotel

The breakfasts are good with something for everyone but items are not replenished regularly enough and staff are slightly lax with regard to serving tea and coffee the rest you have to do for yourself
1: Payed extra for Executive Lounge and made our stay and room upgrade significantly more enjoyable Staff in all areas were super to us and would choose to stay there again
Overall it is a nice hotel but too expensive for 4 star service
For us the stand out feature was the staff
Staff appeared happy to be there and expressed this in conversation
The older concierge guy on the desk was fantastic and nothing was too much trouble
The staff we encountered throughout our stay were a credit to the hotel
Yet the stuff was really nice and service oriented
The overal service was on a very high level
Staff at the breakfast and room facilities
2: So my conclusion is They have thefts among their staff
3: Breakfast in the main restaurant was okay but very much a “ conveyor belt ” service
I would suggest making better use of the entire rooftop area and providing a fuller service
We had the chance to try out also the Atrio restaurant at the 3rd floor where we had a wonderful dinner and an exclusive service from the waiter Manuel

After an hour of checking in i hear commotion in the corridor of the room and a particular person swearing her head off with constant use of f words against some other persons which i then realised were staff
The brawl persisted for more than 15 minutes between the hotel staff without any care if the rooms were occupied with guests or not

Please beware of the executive lounge i was offered this service for free on day 1 on day 2 they charged me heftily and without notice escorting me down to the reception to make sure i pay the bill before i leave
Referring this to the executive reception on the 13th floor she flatly replied that the matter was being taken care of
Must say that reception and employees are really helpful and that makes it hard to get lost
